title: Weekly Utah Meetup
locations: Riftgate Games, 5412 S 900 E, Murray, UT 84117
Hearthside Games, 6802 S Redwood Road, West Jordan, UT
details: Weekly meetups at Riftgate Games in Murray, Utah. All are welcome to come learn and play Netrunner! We'll start around 6 each week.
Enjoy our weekly meetup at a soon-to-open card shop, Hearthside Games, in West Jordan. Anybody is welcome to attend. Come learn Netrunner from the best players in the valley.
